thread.title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
thread.title_full: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game

title: Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game
text:
> Pennsylvania Arrieta, Cubs silence Pirates 4-0 to win NL wild-card game Chicago Cubs' Kyle Schwarber singles to drive in Dexter Fowler in during the first inning of the National League wild card baseball game Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Pittsburgh.
